div.p: SWINK SCHOOL YEAR 2019-2020. It is mandatory for all students Pre-K through 8th grade to pre-enroll for the 2019-2020 school year. ...
*****COMMUNITY MEETING, May 6, 2019 at 6:00 p.m. in the Swink Gymnasium*****
CHECK THE EVENTS PAGE FOR THE CALENDAR EVENTS FOR THE REST OF THE SCHOOL YEAR!
We would like to remind all parents that the month of April is our time for Oklahoma State testing. If at all possible, we need you ...
Swink Schools Fall/Thanksgiving Break will be November 19 - 22, 2018. There will be no school. Will see everyone back rested and ready to finish 2018 on the 26th of November!...
Choctaw Nation will be at Swink School Tuesday, November 6 to administer flu shots free of charge to any Swink students and faculty. Information and permission forms will go out to parents soon....

CPR training will be held at Swink School Friday, October 26 from 8:00 A.M. to 12:00 P.M. The training fee is $10.00 which includes a certification card. Ten teachers are signed up for the training......
